name: Nefarious Night of Necromancy
description:
Overview

It's a lonely life, spending all your time in a graveyard.  As a gravedigger on a quest for company you’ve decided to take matters into your own hands.  Assemble your tools and harvest the last 5 organs you need from the recently deceased to create the ultimate Frankenstein monster.

Goal

The player’s main objective to search the graves of people that have been recently buried in order to harvest their organs. The goal is to build the best Frankenstein monster.

Gameplay

Collect parts from around the graveyard to assemble tools to enhance your grave robbing skills.  Dig up graves to collect unused organs from recently buried corpses. Create the ultimate Frankenstein’s Monster.
